replies.body:
Excuse me, but this is fake news. Gameplay would *never* have to decide between actual good ideas on balance and raging shitposts.

They *always* press the right button.

> [{quoted}](name=DuskDaUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=qUJjwQvk,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-06-26T23:05:24.365+0000)
>
> Excuse me, but this is fake news. Gameplay would *never* have to decide between actual good ideas on balance and raging shitposts.
> 
> They *always* press the right button.

It's funny because the right button is not the right
It's actually more like the right one on both sides, but replace Yasuo and Irelia with Yi and Mordekaiser

TBF, you don't really need to give a reason to complain about Yasuo or Irelia.

The answers as to why Irelia and Yasuo should be FUDGE FLIPPIN' AND DIPPIN' DELETED is in the hearts of all the good little boy and girls on this wonderful green planet we call home.

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}} 

>###Also, give us back Karma.  Darha is not Karma!   }:' 3
